Plot: With his oldest daughter's wedding approaching, a father finds himself reluctant to let go.
Title: Father of the Bride
Writer: Frances Goodrich (screenplay), Albert Hackett (screenplay), Nancy Meyers (screenplay), Charles Shyer (screenplay)
Actors: Steve Martin, Diane Keaton, Kimberly Williams-Paisley, Kieran Culkin
tomatoConsensus: While it doesn't quite hit the heights of the original, this remake of the 1950 classic is pleasantly enjoyable, thanks in large part to winning performances from Steve Martin and Martin Short.
